name: Large Compression Packing Cubes for Travel-Packing Cube Luggage Organizers 7 Piece Set for Checked Luggage-Ultralight, Expandable/Compression Bags by TRIPPED Travel Gear (Grey/Orange)
short_description: PACKING CUBES MAKE TRAVEL EASIER. Compression cubes help you with packaging your clothes for upcoming trips by compressing the air out of them. Make your suitcase up to 30% more spacious!
LUGGAGE ORGANIZER- Keep different outfits in separate compression cubes and always be ready for what’s next! Easily pack away clothing like raincoats/heavier jackets that are not used as often.

HOW MUCH DOES EXTRA LARGE SET HOLD? Extra Large packing cube holds approx 3 Mens Large Tshirts, Large puffy jacket, 2 long sleeve large shirts, one pair jeans, one pair mens pants. Large compression cube holds 2 mens tshirts, 1 pair mens pants, and 2 long sleeve shirts. Small compression cube holds about 8 womens shirts. Tube cube holds electronics, toiletries, underwear or swimsuits. Laundry bag is great for dirty clothes or shoes.

USE EXPANDED OR COMPRESSED- Use these like normal packing cubes when you need to pack more. Packing less? Use the compression zipper to save even more space! Extra Large Dimensions Compressed size: 15.7x11x4in Large Dimensions Compressed size: 14x10x1in Expanded Size: 14x10x4in Small Dimensions Compressed size 10x7x1in Expanded Size: 10x7x4in

short_description: Travel Essentials: Our compression bags for travel save your storage space with no vacuum needed. With hand roll, the bag will compress the clothing. Multi-purpose uses for travel accessories, trips and home.

12 travel compression packing bags include: 5pcs Large roll size-27.5x19.5'' (70x50 cm), 5pcs Medium roll size -23.5x15.7'' (60x40 cm) and 2pcs Small roll size-19.5x13.8'' (50x35 cm). Suitable for your closet, suitcases and boarding bags.

Travel Accessories: Our compression travel bags use extra thick PA+PE to secure your clothes from dirt, dust and other damages. The double layer design ensures long term storage. Our packing bags for travel can be reused multiple times.

Instruction: Place your items inside the roll up compression bag, make sure your items are dry enough. Clear your work area of any sharp objects that can potentially damage the roll bag. Seal the bag, slide the zipper at least 2-3 times. Roll the bag starting from the zipper side.

name: Cambond Compression Packing Cubes for Travel - Lightweight Expandable Travel Bags Luggage Organizers Travel Essentials Compression Cubes for Travel Space Saver for Carry on Suitcases Organizer
product_description: Frequently Asked Questions Q: DO THESE COMPRESSION CUBES FIT IN A CARRY-ON SUITCASE? A: Yes, this 4/5/6/7-piece set is specifically designed to fit perfectly in standard 20-inch to 28-inch carryy-on luggage and backpacks, making them ideal for weekend trips and short vacations. Q: HOW DOES THE COMPRESSION ZIPPER WORK? A: These organizers use a double-zipper system. First, zip the bag closed like a normal packing cube. Then, use the second compression zipper to flatten the bag, removing excess air and reducing thicknessby up to 50% to save space. Q: IS IT VACUUM COMPRESSION? A: No, These compression cubes feature double zippers to compress clothes by up to 40%~50%(Just zip to compress, no vacuum or pump), allowing you to pack more clothes in the suitcase . Q: ARE THESE BAGS MACHINE WASHABLE? A: We recommend hand washing these nylon packing cubes with mild soap and air drying to maintain the integrity of the compression zippers and water-resistant coating.
